# Reflexive Dodge (Ex)
## Overview
*Reflexive Dodge (Ex)*: While using her [[Rolling Dodge (Ex)|rolling dodge]] rage power, the barbarian may apply her dodge bonus to AC as a bonus on Reflex saving throws. A barbarian must have the [[Rolling Dodge (Ex)|rolling dodg]]e rage power and be at least 6th level before selecting this rage power.

**Source:** Ultimate Combat, pg. 27
